scripts.prestart: dotnet tool restore && dotnet fable clean --yes
scripts.prebuild: dotnet tool restore && dotnet fable clean --yes
scripts.build: dotnet tool restore && dotnet fable ./UserInterface --run vite build
scripts.test:live: cd UserInterface.Tests && dotnet fable watch --run npx vite
scripts.pretest: dotnet tool restore && dotnet fable clean --yes
scripts.test: dotnet fable ./UserInterface.Tests --outDir dist/tests && mocha dist/tests -r esm
